Html:
Just let everyone know I added the project to the Visual Studio Industry Partner (VSIP) program at Microsoft. This will allow us to get a PLK s that we can automatically install the controls into Visual Studio.


We can also put an icon in the splash screen as an installed product if we like. Now if we just had a distinct project icon to use…

Nice scorn,
this will add up some more motivation to work..

Thanks,

I just wish MS documented Visual Studio 2005 integration better. I’m really struggling with help file integration in their new format. I may have to put this part off until version 1.5. :-(

Scorn
